name: Wealth OS
description: Struggling to stay on top of your savings and budgeting goals? Or, looking for a better way to track your expenses and manage your money?Introducing the ultimate financial tracking system powered by Notion! The Wealth OS makes it easy to stay on top of your expenses and budget, no matter where you are. With simple start-up and monthly set-up systems, you'll be up and running in no time.
